input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure

Product keywords:
Kids can recreate their favorite matches with this approximately 6-inch figure created in "Superstar scale"
Pose to spar, menace, pair to battle or create mayhem with multiple figures (each sold separately)
Offers articulation, amazing accuracy and authentic details like armbands and tattoos
A wide variety of Superstars means loads of possibilities for WWE mayhem!
Each sold separately, subject to availability
 Colors and decorations may vary.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Attention: Hey there, young WWE fanatics! Are you ready to bring the excitement of the ring into your home? Look no further than our WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure! 💥

Interest: This approximately 6-inch figure is crafted in "Superstar scale" and features articulation, amazing accuracy, and authentic details like armbands and tattoos. 🤩 Recreate your favorite matches or create your own mayhem with multiple figures (each sold separately). 💪

Desire: Imagine the thrill of having your favorite WWE Superstar in your collection! With a wide variety of Superstars to choose from, the possibilities for WWE mayhem are endless! 😍 And with poseable figures, you can recreate all the epic moments from the ring. 💥

Action: Get ready to bring the action into your home! Our WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure is available now, so don't wait to add him to your collection! 🎉 Each figure is sold separately, subject to availability, so grab yours before they're gone! 🔥 Colors and decorations may vary, but the excitement will be the same! 💪🏽👊🏽

Note: The product description is written in a fun and engaging tone, with a focus on the product's features and the excitement of being a WWE fan. The language used is playful and inclusive, with a goal of appealing to young children who are interested in WWE and action figures.
input_text.Response B: The WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure is a great toy for kids who love wrestling! Your child can recreate their favorite matches with this approximately 6-inch figure created in "Superstar scale." Pose Braun Strowman to spar, menace, pair to battle or create mayhem with multiple figures (each sold separately). This action figure offers articulation, amazing accuracy and authentic details like armbands and tattoos. The WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure is made for WWE fans ages 6 and up.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
